attributes.action: To dismiss the Home Secretary for Drug Taking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do we really want a Home Secretary who is a confessed Drug Taker. Can we trust her, is she a fit person to hold such a post, was this information declared on her application for the post.

If the answer to any or all of the above questions is no then we urge you to dismiss her.
